thread.title: TronicS Microsystems H1 net result group share swings to loss of 1.2 mln euros
thread.title_full: BRIEF-TronicS Microsystems H1 net result group share swings to loss of 1.2 mln euros | Reuters

author: Reuters
title: TronicS Microsystems H1 net result group share swings to loss of 1.2 mln euros
text:
Sept 9 TronicS Microsystems SA :
* H1 current operating loss 1.1 million euros ($1.2 million)versus profit of 0.2 million euros a year ago
* H1 net loss group share 1.2 million euros versus profit of 79,000 euros a year ago
* Sees profitable growth from H1 2016
* Confirms 2018 revenue target of 40 million euros
Source text for Eikon: ($1 = 0.8962 euros) (Gdynia Newsroom)
